name: Dual Assembwurm
text: If this card is in your hand or GY: You can banish 2 other Cyberse monsters from your hand and/or face-up from your field; Special Summon this card, but its ATK becomes halved. You can only use this effect of "Dual Assembwurm" once per turn. Once per turn: You can banish 1 card from your hand; banish 1 monster on the field with ATK less than or equal to this card's.
